# ![](img/logo.png){.absolute height="50"} Pricing Tables

```{css, echo=FALSE}
/* Box around the whole pricing table */
.pricing-box {
  border: 2px solid #e0e0e0;
  border-radius: 16px;
  padding: 1.5em;
  background: #f9f9f9;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);
  margin-bottom: 2em;
}

/* Flex container for columns */
.pricing-columns {
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 1em;
}

/* Each pricing column */
.pricing-column {
  flex: 1 1 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  border-radius: 12px;
  background: #fff;
  padding: 1.5em 1em;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.04);
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}

/* Responsive: stack columns vertically on small screens */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .pricing-columns {
    flex-direction: column !important;
  }
  .pricing-column {
    width: 100% !important;
    margin-bottom: 1.5em;
  }
}
```
